original_text: The Lord Almighty, Israel's God, says this: Babylon is like a threshing floor that is ready for people to stamp on wheat. The harvest time will soon come! Then the enemy will cut down Babylon, and they will stamp all over it!’ The Lord Almighty, Israel's God, says this: Babylon is like a threshing floor that is ready for people to stamp on wheat. The harvest time will soon come! Then the enemy will cut down Babylon, and they will stamp all over it!’ The Lord Almighty, Israel's God, says this:
korean_text: 만군의 여호와 이스라엘의 하나님께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 딸 바벨론은 때가 이른 타작 마당과 같은지라 멀지 않아 추수 때가 이르리라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty, Israel's God, says this:
Babylon is like a threshing floor
that is ready for people to stamp on wheat.
The harvest time will soon come!
Then the enemy will cut down Babylon,
and they will stamp all over it!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 위를 모두 밟을 것입니다!
